channel.title: HashCrash on Eunhan's library
channel.description: Recent content in HashCrash on Eunhan's library

item.title: Hash Algorithm - Hash Crash
item.description: Definition one of problems while using the hash algorithm. If the input value is different, the output value should be different. But, the output is same. We calls, “Hash Crash” Characteristics less hash crush is better hash algorithm No hash crush is almost impossible. Example [input]->[output] A->03 B->02 C->03 The output of A and C are same. This is hash crush. solution Most hash algorithm search next output when hash crush happen.
